Elder Lukenir:
You did a good job while you were learning the basics of the game. Now you can go on a journey. I want to give you something. Do you know how to use it?
Now go to Town of Kamael And find Newbie Guide. He'll give you advice. And also - useful items that will be useful in travel.
You'll find the Newbie Guide by clicking question mark right at the bottom of the screen and following the pointer. Well, it's time to go. Good luck!
